annotations.description: Another one by Toby Maloney of the Violet Hour in Chicago! Mr. Maloney is known for his daring cocktail combinations and this is no exception! It's basically...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Neptune's Wrath

textContent:
1.5oz. (45ml) Gin
.25oz. (7.5ml) Absinthe
.25oz. (7.5ml) Green Chartreuse lit on fire
.75oz. (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
.75oz. (22.5ml) Simple Syrup
1 Egg White

Shake all but the Green Chartreuse.
Light Chartreuse on fire and pour onto the top. 
Put out jigger if still on fire. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eoMchfbaVPw
title: Neptune's Wrath
